Application.Name: R
Application.Description: R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics. It compiles and runs on a wide variety of UNIX platforms, Windows and MacOS.

Download.PrefetchScript: $URL = "https://cloud.r-project.org//bin/windows/base/$((Invoke-WebRequest https://cloud.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/ | Select -ExpandProperty Links | Where innerText -like "Download R*for Windows")[0].href)"
Download.ExtraCopyFunctions:
$PathToScript = "$ScriptRoot\ExtraFiles\R\InstallRPackages.R" $PathToR = "C:\Program Files\R\R-$Version" $PathToRexe = "$PathToR\bin\R.exe" $PathtoRLib = "$PathToR\Library" Add-LogContent "Path To Script: $PathToScript`n Path To R: $PathToR`n Path To R.exe: $PathToRexe`n Path To R Library: $PathToRLib"
# Install R Add-LogContent "Installing R" Start-Process $PathToDownload -ArgumentList "/Silent" -Wait
for ($i=0; $i -le 120; $i++){ if (Test-Path $PathToRexe){ sleep 10 break } sleep 1 }
# Run R with the Script to Install the Packages add-logcontent "Starting $PathToRexe with Script $PathToScript" Start-Process $PathToRexe -ArgumentList "-f `"$PathToScript`"" -Wait Add-LogContent "End of $PathToRexe"
#Set a new FullVersion based on the Bin Version $Download.FullVersion = ([String]((Get-Item $PathtoRexe).VersionInfo.FileVersionRaw)).TrimStart().TrimEnd()
# Zip the Library Folder Add-LogContent "Zipping the R Library Folder" Start-Process .\7za.exe -ArgumentList "a `"$TempDir\library.7z`" `"$PathtoRLib`"" -Wait
# Uninstall R Add-LogContent "Uninstalling R" Start-Process "$PathToR\unins000.exe" -ArgumentList "/Silent" -Wait
# Wait for R To be Uninstalled for ($i=0; $i -le 120; $i++){ if (-not (Test-Path $PathToRexe)){ sleep 10 Remove-Item -Path $PathToR -Recurse -Force break } sleep 1 }
Add-LogContent "Copying Library.7z and other Files to Destination" Copy-Item $TempDir\library.7z -Destination $DestinationPath\library.7z -force Copy-item $ScriptRoot\ExtraFiles\R\*.* $DestinationPath\ -force -recurse
